attributes.action: target INDUSTRY (minimum 80%)  as regards  carbon emissions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Even assuming the exaggerated figure of 20 percent for road transport and aviation carbon emissions is correct, why is 100 per cent of the blame being attributed to 20 per cent of the "cause"? What about the other EIGHTY percent - INDUSTRY?
Something is not right here.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
